title: Pet Friendly Modern Micro!
neighborhood: Seattle, UW, Ravenna, Green Lake, Wedgwood
posting_body: ['To schedule a tour', 'Please call or text us at', 'show contact info', 'to schedule from your phone or book your appointment online anytime by emailing us at Sedona @ epicasset .', 'com!', 'About this Home', '# 337:', 'Near bus line 522, 15-minute bike ride to the University of Washington, and walking distance to Roosevelt Square and Safeway!', 'Our open concept floorplan gives you plenty of space to personalize your home to fit your style & needs.', 'With 201 sq ft of space this micro studio is the perfect place to rest & refresh.', 'Contemporary touches included a sleek kitchen with brushed nickel finishes, customized soft-close cabinets, modern hardwood vinyl flooring, and over-sized windows for abundant natural light.', 'Shared kitchens available for 24/7 use!', 'Walk Score:', '76 – Very Walkable.', 'Most errands can be accomplished on foot.', 'Transit Score:', '52 – Good Transit.', 'Many nearby public transportation options.', 'Bike Score:', '64 – Bikeable.', 'Some hills, some bike lanes', 'Details', 'Availability date:', 'NOW', 'Application fee:', '$49 per Adult Applicant', 'Deposit:', '$250.00 Refundable Deposit', 'Pets:', 'All Pets Welcome!', '2 Pet Max per home.', 'No breed or weight restrictions.', 'Pet Deposit:', '$250 Refundable Deposit Per Pet', 'Pet Rent:', '$35 per month per pet', 'Leasing options:', '12 month leases available!', 'Amenities', 'Utilities:', '$50 - $75 per occupant (max charge $150 for two occupants)', 'Kitchens:', 'Shared kitchens available on 2nd through 5th floors', 'Laundry:', '24/7 Laundry Facilities Located Throughout Building', 'Parking type:', 'Residential Off-Street or Assigned Garage Parking', 'Parking notes:', '$145/mo per Spot', 'Appliances:', 'Sleek Kitchenette Featuring: Refrigerator, Microwave, Stainless Steel Sink & Custom Soft-Close Cabinets with Brushed Nickel Finishes', 'Heating/Cooling:', 'Dual Pane/Storm Grade Windows &  Electric Forced Air Heat', 'Wiring:', 'Century Link High-Speed Fiber Optic Internet', 'Facilities and Recreation:', 'Co-Working Resident Lounge, 24/7 Access Fitness Center & Rooftop Green Space', 'Security and Access:', 'Keyless Controlled Entry & Nightly Courtesy Patrol', 'Additional features:', 'Non-Smoking & Pet Friendly!', 'Offered by:', 'Sedona Apartments', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Loft, Micro loft, rental loft, rental apartment, artist loft, creative space, creative loft, artist studio, art studio, micro-apartment, new apartment, fitness center, resident lounge, package lockers, parking, roof terrace, sustainable, Green Lake, Ravenna, UW, Cornish, Seattle U., North Seattle, Wallingford, Seattle, Public Transportation, Bus, Bike, Bicycle, Pet, Pet Friendly, No Breed Restrictions, Private Bathroom, Shared Kitchens, Dog Friendly, Cat Friendly, Micro-Studio, Micro, New Building, Internet Ready, Internet, Low Utilities, Non-Smoking, Bus line, Parks, Restaurants, Walking']
